description: A young knight named Gareth is sent to stop a raging dragon. Armed with an enchanted shield of living flame, the knight discovers the dragon is bound by an old curse and chooses mercy over victory, turning a feared enemy into a guardian of the realm.
name: The Ember Shield and the Dragon’s Oath

cover_text.text: The Ember Shield and the Dragon’s Oath

pages.description: A young knight witnesses a dragon attack and accepts a mission to stop the destruction.
pages.story_text: A dragon flew over Emberkeep, and rooftops caught fire. {name} held {they} practice sword tight as the captain said, "Go—help us." {name} took a deep breath and set off.

pages.description: In a moonlit cave, a mysterious mentor gifts the knight a shield of living flame that responds only to mercy.
pages.story_text: {name} found a moonlit cave and a hooded mentor. Fire shaped itself into the Ember Shield. "It only works for mercy," the mentor warned.

pages.description: The knight faces the dragon in its lair, survives its flames, and notices enchanted chains that reveal the creature is cursed.
pages.story_text: In the dragon’s lair, flames rushed at {name}. The Ember Shield bent the fire away. Then {name} saw rune-chains on the dragon’s neck. "You’re trapped," {name} called.

pages.description: Choosing compassion over victory, the knight breaks the curse, frees the dragon, and forms an oath to protect the realm together.
pages.story_text: {name} pressed the Ember Shield to the chains, and bright light cracked the runes. The chains fell, and the dragon’s eyes turned gentle. It bowed beside {they}. Together, they promised to protect Emberkeep.

cover_text.text: Mercy is the bravest kind of strength.
When we choose kindness, even fear can become a friend.
